{{Infobox Berry |name = Magost |image = [[File:Magost.png]] |caption = The grown-up flavor and dreamy sweetness of this Berry make it a favorite of Pok√©mon everywhere. |growtime = 4h 0m 0s |harvest = 27 berries |replant = 10% |points = 750 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *20 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Magost''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Pecha]], at least 1 [[Nanab]] and at least 1 [[Mago]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 mins || 1 hour 48 mins 20 secs || 2 hours 46 mins 40 secs || 4 hours - 8 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagostTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagostTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:MagostTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Magost berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] |- | [[File:Nanab.png|30px]] [[Nanab]] || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || [[File:Nanab.png|30px]] [[Nanab]] || [[File:Mago.png|30px]]
